prefixes:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wds: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/statement/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wdtn: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct-normalized/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX shmarql: <https://shmarql.com/>
PREFIX cto: <https://nfdi4culture.de/ontology#>
PREFIX n4c: <https://nfdi4culture.de/id/>
PREFIX nfdicore: <https://nfdi.fiz-karlsruhe.de/ontology/>

queries.count_composition_year:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?year (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  BIND(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated)) AS ?year)
}
GROUP BY ?year
ORDER BY ?year
queries.count_composition_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?decade (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ?decade
queries.distinct_years:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT (YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated)) AS ?year)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
}
ORDER BY ?year
queries.count_compositions_composers_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?decade (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions) (COUNT(DISTINCT ?composer) AS ?numberOfComposers)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition schema:composer ?composer .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ?decade
queries.count_compositions_persons_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX nfdicore: <https://nfdi4culture.de/ontology#>

SELECT ?decade (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions) (COUNT(DISTINCT ?person) AS ?numberOfRelatedPersons)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition nfdicore:relatedPerson ?person .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ?decade
queries.count_compositions_composer_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?decade ?composer (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition schema:composer ?composer .
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade ?composer
ORDER BY ?decade DESC (?numberOfCompositions)
queries.count_compositions_composer_name_decade:
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>

SELECT ?decade ?composer ?composerName (COUNT(?composition) AS ?numberOfCompositions)
WHERE {
  ?composition rdf:type schema:MusicComposition .
  ?composition schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
  ?composition schema:composer ?composer .
  OPTIONAL { ?composer schema:name ?composerName . } # Attempt to get human-readable name
  OPTIONAL { ?composer rdfs:label ?composerName . }  # Fallback to rdfs:label if available
  BIND(FLOOR(YEAR(xsd:dateTime(?dateCreated))/10)*10 AS ?decade)
}
GROUP BY ?decade ?composer ?composerName
ORDER BY ?decade DESC (?numberOfCompositions)
queries.count_resources_by_location:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wds: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/statement/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wdtn: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct-normalized/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX shmarql: <https://shmarql.com/>
PREFIX cto: <https://nfdi4culture.de/ontology#>
PREFIX n4c: <https://nfdi4culture.de/id/>
PREFIX nfdicore: <https://nfdi.fiz-karlsruhe.de/ontology/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT DISTINCT
    ?location
    ?locationLabel
    (COUNT(?resource) AS ?locationCount)
WHERE {
    ?resource cto:elementOf n4c:E5320 .
    ?resource cto:relatedLocation ?location .
    ?location rdfs:label ?locationLabel .
}
GROUP BY ?location ?locationLabel
ORDER BY DESC(?locationCount)
queries.filter_resources_by_location:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wds: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/statement/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wdtn: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct-normalized/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX shmarql: <https://shmarql.com/>
PREFIX cto: <https://nfdi4culture.de/ontology#>
PREFIX n4c: <https://nfdi4culture.de/id/>
PREFIX nfdicore: <https://nfdi.fiz-karlsruhe.de/ontology/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?resource ?resourceType ?locationLabel WHERE {
    ?resource cto:elementOf n4c:E5320 .
    ?resource cto:relatedLocation ?location .
    ?location rdfs:label ?locationLabel .
    FILTER(CONTAINS(LCASE(STR(?locationLabel)), "dresden")) .
    OPTIONAL { ?resource rdf:type ?resourceType . }
}
queries.filter_resources_with_creation_period:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wds: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/statement/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wdtn: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct-normalized/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX shmarql: <https://shmarql.com/>
PREFIX cto: <https://nfdi4culture.de/ontology#>
PREFIX n4c: <https://nfdi4culture.de/id/>
PREFIX nfdicore: <https://nfdi.fiz-karlsruhe.de/ontology/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?resource ?period ?tcover ?extractedYear WHERE {
    ?resource cto:elementOf n4c:E5313 .
    ?resource schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
    ?resource cto:creationPeriod ?period .
    ?resource schema:temporalCoverage ?tcover .    
    FILTER (DATATYPE(?period) = xsd:string && REGEX(?period, "\\d{4}")) .    
    BIND (REPLACE(STR(?period), ".*?(\\d{4}).*", "$1") AS ?extractedYear) .
}
ORDER BY ASC(?period)
queries.filter_resources_with_decade:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wds: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/statement/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wdtn: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct-normalized/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX shmarql: <https://shmarql.com/>
PREFIX cto: <https://nfdi4culture.de/ontology#>
PREFIX n4c: <https://nfdi4culture.de/id/>
PREFIX nfdicore: <https://nfdi.fiz-karlsruhe.de/ontology/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?resource ?period ?tcover ?extractedYear ?decade WHERE {
    ?resource cto:elementOf n4c:E5313 .
    ?resource schema:dateCreated ?dateCreated .
    ?resource cto:creationPeriod ?period .
    ?resource schema:temporalCoverage ?tcover .    
    FILTER (DATATYPE(?period) = xsd:string && REGEX(?period, "\\d{4}")) .    
    BIND (REPLACE(STR(?period), ".*?(\\d{4}).*", "$1") AS ?extractedYear) .    
    BIND (CONCAT(STR(FLOOR(xsd:integer(?extractedYear) / 10) * 10), "s") AS ?decade) .
}
ORDER BY ASC(?period)
queries.count_resources_by_decade:
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/>
PREFIX wds: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/statement/>
PREFIX wikibase: <http://wikiba.se/ontology#>
PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/>
PREFIX wdtn: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct-normalized/>
PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
PREFIX shmarql: <https://shmarql.com/>
PREFIX cto: <https://nfdi4culture.de/ontology#>
PREFIX n4c: <https://nfdi4culture.de/id/>
PREFIX nfdicore: <https://nfdi.fiz-karlsruhe.de/ontology/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?decade (COUNT(?resource) AS ?resourceCount) WHERE {
    ?resource cto:elementOf n4c:E5313 .
    ?resource cto:creationPeriod ?period .    
    FILTER (DATATYPE(?period) = xsd:string && REGEX(?period, "\\d{4}")) .    
    BIND (REPLACE(STR(?period), ".*?(\\d{4}).*", "$1") AS ?extractedYear) .    
    BIND (CONCAT(STR(FLOOR(xsd:integer(?extractedYear) / 10) * 10), "s") AS ?decade) .
}
GROUP BY ?decade
ORDER BY ASC(?decade)
